ing: 1 (10 ounce) package baby spinach leaves, finely chopped
des: "A light, easy-to-make salad that's pleasing to the palate."
ins: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  Add orzo and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and rinse with cold water.  Transfer to a large bowl and stir in spinach, feta, onion, pine nuts, basil and white pepper.  Toss with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.  Refrigerate and serve cold.
